sentences.english: "From each according to his ability, to each according to his need" is a fundamentally good idea.
sentences.chinese: 各尽所能，按需分配从根本上说是个不错的主意。

sentences.english: Doing our best for the common development. all company's of the members common goal.
sentences.chinese: 各尽所能共同发展是公司全体成员的共同目标。
